snippet.title: Vacation Simulator: Back to Job - DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Our new free DLC Vacation Simulator: Back to Job is available now on PC (SteamVR + Oculus) and Oculus Quest. The DLC will land on PlayStation VR this October.

The Gig Economy has arrived in the Vacation Simulator! All Bots have gone on vacation and no one is left to Job. Time for the human to enter the “on-demand” workforce to make the perfect vacation for Bots! Time to Job— again!

Vacation Simulator Website: https://www.vacationsimulatorgame.com

Oculus Quest: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2393300320759737/?locale=en_US 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/726830/Vacation_Simulator/ 

Follow Owlchemy Labs!
Twitter: https://twitter.com/OwlchemyLabs
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/OwlchemyLabs/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/owlchemylabs/

Copyright © 2020 Owlchemy Labs Inc.
